options.text: This Azure Sentinel Solution installs analytic rules for PRODUCT NAME / DOMAIN / VERTICAL that you can enable for custom alert generation in Azure Sentinel. These analytic rules will be deployed in disabled mode in the analytics rules gallery of your Azure Sentinel workspace. Configure and enable these rules in the analytic rules gallery after this Solution deploys.

Enter details about this rule.  This rule depends on the PRODUCT NAME(S) data connector(s) and <list data types like Proofpoint_CL or CommonEventFormat or Syslog> data type. List if here are any Parser dependencies with link to Parser as well. It is mapped to the Initial Access MITRE tactic.

This solution installs workbooks(s).  Workbooks provide a flexible canvas for data analysis and the creation of rich visual reports within the Azure portal. They allow you to tap into multiple data sources from across Azure Sentinel, and combine them into unified interactive experiences.

options.text: This solution installs playbook resources.  A security playbook is a collection of procedures that can be run from Azure Sentinel in response to an alert. A security playbook can help automate and orchestrate your response, and can be run manually or set to run automatically when specific alerts are triggered. Security playbooks in Azure Sentinel are based on Azure Logic Apps, which means that you get all the power, customizability, and built-in templates of Logic Apps. Each playbook is created for the specific subscription you choose, but when you look at the Playbooks page, you will see all the playbooks across any selected subscriptions.
